content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'for':
content.explanation: El presente perfecto continuo se utiliza para hablar de acciones que comenzaron en el pasado y continúan en el presente, usando 'for' para indicar la duración.
content.stimulus_en:
She started studying English three years ago.

She has been studying English... ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'since':
content.explanation: Usamos 'since' para indicar el punto específico en el tiempo donde comenzó la acción que sigue en el presente.
content.stimulus_en:
They began playing football last summer.

They have been playing football... ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'for':
content.explanation: El 'for' se utiliza para expresar la duración de la acción que comenzó en el pasado y sigue en el presente.
content.stimulus_en:
I started working here two months ago.

I have been working here... ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'since':
content.explanation: Usamos 'since' para indicar cuando comenzó la acción que continúa hasta ahora.
content.stimulus_en:
He has been running every day. This started in January.

He has been running every day... ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'for':
content.explanation: El 'for' muestra la duración de la actividad que comenzó en el pasado y sigue en el presente.
content.stimulus_en:
They started planning the event last month.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences using reported speech.
content.explanation: En el discurso indirecto, usamos el pasado para reportar algo que se dijo en presente.
content.stimulus_en: She said, 'I am working on a new project.' --> She said that she ___ on a new project.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences using reported speech.
content.explanation: Cuando se hace una pregunta en directo, en el discurso indirecto cambiamos el tiempo verbal al pasado.
content.stimulus_en: He asked, 'Are you attending the conference?' --> He asked if I ___ attending the conference.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences using reported speech.
content.explanation: El futuro se transforma en 'would' cuando lo reportamos.
content.stimulus_en: They told me, 'We will finish the report tomorrow.' --> They told me that they ___ the report the next day.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences using reported speech.
content.explanation: Para los modales, cambiamos 'can' a 'could' en el discurso reportado.
content.stimulus_en: James said, 'I can't attend the meeting.' --> James said that he ___ attend the meeting.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences using reported speech.
content.explanation: El futuro se convierte en 'would' en el discurso indirecto.
content.stimulus_en: She said, 'I will send you the documents.' --> She said that she ___ me the documents soon.

content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks with the most appropriate word.
content.main_text: In recent years, many people have started to rely on online reviews before making a purchase. Some reviews are very detailed, while others are quite short. It is important to read (1)___ reviews from different sources to form (2)___ opinion. Many websites allow users to rate products and share their experiences. However, not all reviews are trustworthy, so it is wise to be (3)___ when reading them. When writing a review, one should include (4)___ information, such as the benefits and drawbacks of the product. This helps other consumers make (5)___ informed choices.
content.explanation:
(1) En este contexto, se refiere a leer 'varias' reseñas para obtener una mejor perspectiva.
(2) Se refiere a tener 'su' propia opinión basada en diferentes reseñas.
(3) Significa ser 'cauteloso' al leer reseñas para evitar información engañosa.
(4) Aquí se sugiere incluir 'información específica' que ayude a otros consumidores.
(5) Indica que las decisiones se vuelven 'más' informadas con buena información.
